description:
I had a lot of fun with Isaak on his last visit. So much so that I knew I wanted him back for more. He told me he had never had sex with another guy before. He didn't want to bottom, but he was OK with fucking another guy.
I wanted to hook him up with someone who would really appreciate getting plowed by his big, beautiful dick. Trevor was (of course) who came to mind.
So, I got the two of them together and at first the situation was a little tense. I had them get undressed and before Issak's pants were even off, Trevor was all over his dick.
Isaak is really shy and kind of quiet, but he knows how to fuck. Trevor always trys to play it cool, but he loves to get fucked. I think they are great together <g>.
title: Issak & Trevor
